question: 互い
sourceMnemonic: Despite it looking like an adjective, this is the noun version of the kanji, making it <vocabulary>mutual</vocabulary>. It also means <vocabulary>each other</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>reciprocal</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>together</vocabulary>, too.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Let's help <vocabulary>each other</vocabulary>. Maybe if we work <vocabulary>together</vocabulary> we can get rid of this <reading>tagger</reading> (<ja>たが</ja>) tagging graffiti all over our neighborhood.
